name: Verify Number of Entries displayed

testSteps.description: 1: Verify Number of Entries displayed ({parentTab=Policy, childTab=View Policies, noOfRecords=25, heading=View Policies})

children.description: Given User is logged into MIS
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "View Policies" sub tab of "Policy" tab
And Verify "View Policies" of "View Policies" tab
And Verify number of records displayed by default
Then Select "25" as number of entries
And Verify number of records displayed changes

userStory.narrative: This tests are for Policy module of MIS Beta

title: Verify Number of Entries displayed

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When User is on MIS Home Page
When User clicks on "<childTab>" sub tab of "<parentTab>" tab
And Verify "<heading>" of "<childTab>" tab
And Verify number of records displayed by default
Then Select "<noOfRecords>" as number of entries
And Verify number of records displayed changes
